column5: I took my 2 nefew's out for thier first ice fishing excursion today. After an hr in, the rod starts to dangle.... I yell at Scott (cause he was colsest to it) he sets the hook and reel's it in like he wanted to set the line on fire......a small pike. Maybe ft long, comes out through the hole like a rocket..... He drops everything..... pole and fish on the ice.... RUNS about 10 ft away....stops, turns and yells holy crap!!!! (i know the whole lake heard us) Probably the biggest fish he ever caught. No pic cause i was laughing so hard, and he wouldnt touch it.  Just had to share.
that's what it's all about! good story
A memory that he will never forget and a memory you will always remember as well.
Kids and fishin go together like peanut butter and jam  S.
Where's the camera when you need it, that's super funny.
haha. I'm sure you'll remind them of this story many years from now.

haha. I'm sure you'll remind them of this story many years from now. OOOhhhhhhhhhh ya. My 2 daughters also tagged along, (better fisher's.. no insult intended) The oldest one come tearing around the corner as im on the couch watching the news.... did the reel and ran into the kitchen.... 2 seconds later she came back with tears in her eyes.
